title: Logo
summary: A logo (abbreviation of logotype;[1] from Ancient Greek  λόγος (lógos) 'word, speech', and  τύπος (túpos) 'mark, imprint') is a graphic mark, emblem, or symbol used to aid and promote public identification and recognition. It may be of an abstract or figurative design or include the text of the name it represents as in a wordmark.
